definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Industrial calcium chloride aqueous solution used as anti-icing fluid has some corrosive action to common metals.
sentences.chinese: 工业氯化钙水溶液作为防冻液有一定的腐蚀性。

sentences.english: The carbon tool steel was quenched into the different concentration of calcium chloride watery solution.
sentences.chinese: 对碳素工具钢采用不同浓度的氯化钙水溶液进行淬火。

sentences.english: This paper reports an X-ray absorption method for on-line analysis of calcium chloride.
sentences.chinese: 本文叙述了一种在线分析氯化钙的X射线吸收法。

sentences.english: METHODS Wet granulation technique was employed to prepare pectin-calcium chloride matrix tablets.
sentences.chinese: 方法湿法制粒压片法制备吲哚美辛果胶氯化钙骨架片。

sentences.english: Another group with neither magnesium aspartate nor calcium calcium supplementation was used as control.
sentences.chinese: 另设一对照组，其饲粮中不添加天冬氨酸镁和氯化钙。

sentences.english: In addition, adding calcium chloride to pectin solution could increase its apparent viscosity.
sentences.chinese: 氯化钙溶液的加入可明显增加果胶溶液的表观粘度。

sentences.english: Acetic acid calcium had better effect than calcium chloride.
sentences.chinese: 醋酸钙代替氯化钙效果更好。

sentences.english: Calcium chloride anhydrous is (a kind of) consumable during operation (in work process) and should be added regularly.
sentences.chinese: 无水氯化钙在工作过程中为消耗品，定期需补充。

sentences.english: The pharmaceutical grade calcium chloride production is mainly adopted technology of the lime stone- hydrochloric acid.
sentences.chinese: 食品医药级氯化钙产品主要采用盐酸石灰石工艺生产。

sentences.english: The desilication process from the sodium aluminate solution with calcium chloride is investigated by experiment.
sentences.chinese: 通过试验研究用氯化钙从铝酸钠溶液中脱除硅的过程。

sentences.english: As a cool-carrying agent, CaCl2 aqueous solution can be used in liquid chlorine production by the method of low-temperature and low-pressure.
sentences.chinese: 氯化钙水溶液可用作低温低压法生产液氯的载冷剂。

sentences.english: The groundwater of Xujiahe formation is mainly the calcium chloride-type of gas field water.
sentences.chinese: 须家河组地层水主要为氯化钙型的气田地层水。

sentences.english: There was synergism between calcium chloride and methanol.
sentences.chinese: 氯化钙和甲醇存在协同增效作用。
